span.strong: Mississinawa Valley Schools is CLOSED through Sunday, May 3, 2020. Students should continue to work on eDay lessons or "blizzard bags".
The Alumni Banquet for this year has been canceled.
Prom has been rescheduled for Saturday, May 9, 2020.
